SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, search_type_xcd, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, search_config_id FROM elp_search_config WHERE search_config_id = :search_config_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_search_config SET code = :code, description = :description, search_type_xcd = :search_type_xcd, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE search_config_id = :search_config_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_search_config ( code, description, search_type_xcd, created_by, search_config_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :search_type_xcd, :created_by, :search_config_id )
